# dateEncodingStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategy used when encoding dates as part of a JSON object.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateEncodingStrategy: JSONEncoder.DateEncodingStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default strategy is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONEncoder/DateEncodingStrategy-swift.enum/deferredToDate] strategy.

## Encoding Dates

- **JSONEncoder.DateEncodingStrategy**: The formatting strategies available for formatting dates when encoding a date as JSON.
